Notes: Newspaper and college records; oil paintings; 18th and 19th century rare books. The Bentley Rare Book Gallery contains several thousand rare and original items with worldwide scope. The University Archives has a wide variety of materials pertaining to the history, growth, and development of Kennesaw State University. In addition, there are a number of collections of private papers and other material of local history interest.
Name Notes: Department of Museums, Archives & Rare Books
